item.title: Investigating object orientation effects across 14 languages
item.description:
Demonstration of the procedure followed in our lab  

Reference

Chen, S., Szabelska, A., Chartier, C. R., Kekecs, Z., Lynott, D., Bernabeu, P., … Schmidt, K. (conditionally accepted). Investigating object orientation effects across 14 languages. Psychonomic Bulletin and Review. https://doi.org/10.31234/osf.io/t2pjv/

item.title: Modality Switches Occur Early and Extend Late in Conceptual Processing: Evidence From ERPs - Master's Thesis
item.description:
Reference

Bernabeu, P. (2017). Modality Switches Occur Early and Extend Late in Conceptual Processing: Evidence From ERPs - Master’s Thesis. PsyArxiv (unreviewed). https://psyarxiv.com/5gjvk
